title: Detective Nipun doesn't give up
description: Words: ca.8000 Age: +6This is a short story which you can read completely for FREE online or download for free here.It is the first story in the Detective Nipun series placed in India.On a hot day the 12 year old Nipun goes to the local market in his district. Soon he meets one of his friends who is dragging him into an adventure. What is going to happen with both of them? Did his friend go to far this time? Nipun is determined to solve this puzzle, even if that means he has to take a risk. Finding some mysterious looking boxes they soon are involved in a big case. You can find more out about him and his friends in a short story placed in the beautiful country of India, where one can find excitement and surprises everywhere. And dozens of interesting animals too!Happy reading!
author: Janosch Fingerhut
